featuresSection.subtitle: Powerful AI-driven capabilities that transform how your team manages code quality, safety, and performance at scale.

autonomous.title: Autonomous Decision Making
autonomous.description: AI that learns your codebase patterns and makes intelligent decisions about code improvements without human intervention.

benefits.learning: Machine learning adapts to your coding standards
benefits.proactive: Proactive issue detection before they impact production

safety.title: Enterprise Safety Gates
safety.description: Multi-layered safety mechanisms ensure changes never compromise system stability or introduce breaking changes.

benefits.rollback: Instant rollback capabilities for all changes

performance.title: High-Performance Architecture
performance.description: Built for scale with optimized processing pipelines that handle enterprise codebases without performance degradation.

benefits.efficiency: Minimal resource usage with maximum impact
benefits.scale: Handles repositories with millions of lines of code

precision.title: Precision-Targeted Fixes
precision.description: Advanced pattern recognition ensures fixes are precise, contextually appropriate, and maintain code integrity.

benefits.accuracy: 99.8% fix accuracy with minimal false positives
benefits.context: Context-aware changes that respect architectural patterns
benefits.minimal: Minimal code changes for maximum quality improvement

integration.title: Universal Integration
integration.description: Seamlessly integrates with your existing development workflow, CI/CD pipelines, and developer tools.

benefits.universal: Works with any Git-based workflow and major IDEs
benefits.workflow: Fits naturally into existing development processes
benefits.tools: Connects to popular tools like Jira, Slack, Teams

insights.title: Business Intelligence
insights.description: Transform code quality metrics into actionable business insights with comprehensive analytics and reporting.

benefits.metrics: Real-time quality metrics and trend analysis
benefits.optimization: ROI tracking and team productivity optimization

safety.label: Safety Rate
safety.description: Changes deployed without introducing regressions or breaking functionality

speed.label: Faster
speed.description: Average improvement in code review and fix deployment cycles

availability.label: Monitoring
availability.description: Continuous quality monitoring without interrupting developer workflow

downtime.label: Setup Time
downtime.description: Ready to start improving your codebase immediately after installation

cta.subtitle: See how ODAVL transforms your development workflow

howItWorks.subtitle: Discover the proven 5-step process that makes ODAVL the most trusted autonomous code quality platform for enterprise teams.

observe.title: Observe
observe.description: Continuous monitoring of your codebase to identify quality patterns, technical debt, and improvement opportunities using advanced static analysis.

details.metrics: Real-time collection of quality metrics and code health indicators
details.patterns: Pattern recognition to identify recurring issues and anti-patterns
details.baseline: Establish baseline measurements for tracking improvement over time

decide.title: Decide
decide.description: AI-powered decision engine analyzes collected data to prioritize fixes and determine the safest, most impactful actions to take.

details.analysis: Intelligent analysis of risk vs. benefit for potential changes
details.priority: Automated prioritization based on business impact and safety
details.safety: Safety gate validation ensures changes meet quality thresholds

act.title: Act
act.description: Precise, automated code modifications executed within safety constraints, with comprehensive testing and validation at every step.

details.execution: Surgical code changes that maintain architectural integrity
details.testing: Automated testing ensures changes don't introduce regressions
details.deployment: Safe deployment with instant rollback capabilities

verify.title: Verify
verify.description: Comprehensive validation of changes through automated testing, quality metrics analysis, and impact assessment.

details.validation: Multi-layer validation including unit, integration, and system tests
details.metrics: Quality metrics verification to confirm improvement achievement
details.rollback: Automatic rollback if verification fails or regressions detected

learn.title: Learn
learn.description: Machine learning algorithms adapt to your codebase patterns, team preferences, and successful outcomes to improve future decisions.

details.adaptation: Continuous learning from team feedback and successful patterns
details.improvement: Model refinement based on historical success and failure data
details.optimization: Optimization of decision-making algorithms for your specific context
